# Pediatric Vehicular Heatstroke (PVH) Assessment and Countermeasures

## RFP Details
* [Reference Number](#referenceNumber): CB-6992-30256115
* [Solicitation Number](#solicitationNumber): T8080-230074
* [Publication Date](#publicationDate): July 5, 2023
* [Tender Closing Date](#tenderClosingDate) and [Time]: August 22, 2023 3:00:00 PM EDT
* [Procurement Category](#procurementCategory): SRV

## Brief Description
The government is seeking proposals from qualified firms to assess the risks and requirements associated with pediatric vehicular heatstroke (PVH) in Canada. The project aims to identify and evaluate technical countermeasures to mitigate the risk of heatstroke-related deaths and injuries involving children aged 8 and under.

## Key Deliverables
* Evaluate the effectiveness of existing original equipment and aftermarket systems for passenger road vehicles in preventing heatstroke-related incidents
* Assess the feasibility of implementing countermeasures to mitigate the risk of heatstroke in Canadian passenger road vehicles
* Develop recommendations for the development, implementation, and monitoring of effective countermeasures

## Technical Requirements
The successful proponent must demonstrate expertise in the following areas:
* Research and development of vehicular heatstroke prevention systems
* Development of technical specifications and testing protocols for vehicular heatstroke prevention systems
